STEP1_DESCRIPTION: Please submit your name and a valid email address, so that after registration we can send you the source code for your SenseBox.
STEP2_DESCRIPTION: Please submit additional information about your SenseBox.
STEP3_DESCRIPTION: Click on the map to choose a location for your SenseBox from the map.
STEP5_DESCRIPTION: To finish registering your SenseBox, click "Save" and you will receive an email with instructions on how to assemble your SenseBox and how to upload your code onto it. If you have changed your mind, click "Cancel" and you will be redirected back to the overview map.
SETTINGS_IMAGE_RESTRICTIONS: Only PNG, JPG, JPEG files are allowed up to a max. size of 1.5 MB
PLEASE_SPECIFY_STATIONNAME: Please specify a name for your station
PLEASE_SPECIFY_GROUPID: Optional prefix for groups of SenseBoxes
